briefdescription.para: Width.
Height.
Depth.
Number of color components.
Number of compressed mip levels.
Cubemap status if DDS.
Texture array status if DDS.
Data is sRGB.
Compressed format.
Pixel data.
Precalculated mip level image.
Next texture array or cube map image.
Construct empty.
Destruct.
Load resource from stream. May be called from a worker thread. Return true if successful.
Save the image to a stream. Regardless of original format, the image is saved as png. Compressed image data is not supported. Return true if successful.
Save the image to a file. Format of the image is determined by file extension. JPG is saved with maximum quality.
Set 2D size and number of color components. Old image data will be destroyed and new data is undefined. Return true if successful.

memberdef.argsstring: (int width, int height, int depth, unsigned components)
memberdef.name: SetSize

briefdescription.para: Set 3D size and number of color components. Old image data will be destroyed and new data is undefined. Return true if successful.
Set new image data.
Set a 2D pixel.

memberdef.argsstring: (int x, int y, int z, const Color &color)
memberdef.name: SetPixel

briefdescription.para: Set a 3D pixel.
Set a 2D pixel with an integer color. R component is in the 8 lowest bits.

memberdef.argsstring: (int x, int y, int z, unsigned uintColor)
memberdef.name: SetPixelInt

briefdescription.para: Set a 3D pixel with an integer color. R component is in the 8 lowest bits.
Load as color LUT. Return true if successful.
Flip image horizontally. Return true if successful.
Flip image vertically. Return true if successful.
Resize image by bilinear resampling. Return true if successful.
Clear the image with a color.
Clear the image with an integer color. R component is in the 8 lowest bits.
Save in BMP format. Return true if successful.
Save in PNG format. Return true if successful.
Save in TGA format. Return true if successful.
Save in JPG format with specified quality. Return true if successful.
Save in DDS format. Only uncompressed RGBA images are supported. Return true if successful.
Save in WebP format with minimum (fastest) or specified compression. Return true if successful. Fails always if WebP support is not compiled in.

detaileddescription.para: Whether this texture is detected as a cubemap, only relevant for DDS. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Whether this texture has been detected as a volume, only relevant for DDS. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Whether this texture is in sRGB, only relevant for DDS. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Return a 2D pixel color.

memberdef.argsstring: (int x, int y, int z) const
memberdef.name: GetPixel

briefdescription.para: Return a 3D pixel color.
Return a 2D pixel integer color. R component is in the 8 lowest bits.

memberdef.argsstring: (int x, int y, int z) const
memberdef.name: GetPixelInt

briefdescription.para: Return a 3D pixel integer color. R component is in the 8 lowest bits.
Return a bilinearly sampled 2D pixel color. X and Y have the range 0-1.

memberdef.argsstring: (float x, float y, float z) const
memberdef.name: GetPixelTrilinear

briefdescription.para: Return a trilinearly sampled 3D pixel color. X, Y and Z have the range 0-1.

detaileddescription.para: Return number of color components. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Return pixel data.

detaileddescription.para: Return number of compressed mip levels. Returns 0 if the image is has not been loaded from a source file containing multiple mip levels. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Return next mip level by bilinear filtering. Note that if the image is already 1x1x1, will keep returning an image of that size.
Return the next sibling image of an array or cubemap.
Return image converted to 4-component (RGBA) to circumvent modern rendering API's not supporting e.g. the luminance-alpha format.
Return a compressed mip level.
Return decompressed image data in RGBA format.
Return subimage from the image by the defined rect or null if failed. 3D images are not supported. You must free the subimage yourself.
Return an SDL surface from the image, or null if failed. Only RGB images are supported. Specify rect to only return partial image. You must free the surface yourself.
Precalculate the mip levels. Used by asynchronous texture loading.

detaileddescription.para: Whether this texture has an alpha channel. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Copy contents of the image into the defined rect, scaling if necessary. This image should already be large enough to include the rect. Compressed and 3D images are not supported.
Clean up the mip levels.
Get all stored mip levels starting from this.
Get all stored mip levels starting from this.
Decode an image using stb_image.
Free an image file's pixel data.
Image resource.
